home.subTitle: What do you want to do today?

instaServices.reKYCDescription: Simplified & Aadhaar-linked address update based Re-KYC Journey for Individual Customers
instaServices.mobileNumberUpdateDescription: Valid for Individual Resident customers, 18 years or older with compliant KYC and active accounts.
instaServices.mobileEmailVerificationDescription: Confirm customer’s mobile/email before updating in bank records.

reKyc.title: Re-KYC
reKyc.notEligibleForInstaServiceRequest: Not eligible for Insta Service Request. Please proceed with form based process.
reKyc.agreeAddressUpdate: I agree that this address will be updated across all accounts.
reKyc.reKYCJourneybuttonsDisableInfoMessage: The previously submitted KYC documents may be invalid or expired, or one or more linked accounts may be inactive

modal.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to exit?
modal.checkBoxText: By clicking the check box, I hereby agree to proceed with the biometric authentication.
modal.dormantAccount: 'Dormant' accounts are not eligible for Insta Services, please proceed with form-based request.

biometric.deviceUsedByOtherAppMessage: Device begin used by another application
biometric.aadhaarAuthFailedOnce: Aadhaar verification failed. Only 2 attempts left
biometric.aadhaarAuthFailedTwice: Aadhaar verification failed. Only 1 attempts left
biometric.formBasedProcess: Please try again or continue with form based process
biometric.noFingerFoundMessage: No finger is placed on device, Please make sure to place your finger on the device

reKyc.reKycSuccessText: Your Re-KYC process has been successfully completed

eligibilityForReKyc.title: Eligibility for Insta Services
eligibilityForReKyc.eligibilityTwo: Aadhaar and PAN/form 60 available in bank records
eligibilityForReKyc.eligibilityThree: Low, Medium and High risk customers

eligibilityForMobileNumberUpdate.title: Please proceed only if the Customer
eligibilityForMobileNumberUpdate.eligibilityFour: Has Active accounts (not dormant or debit freeze or others)

mobileNumberUpdate.title: Mobile Number Update
mobileNumberUpdate.numberUpdateForAboveAccount: Your number will be updated for the above account(s).
mobileNumberUpdate.updateForSelectedCif: Your number will be updated for all individual banking relationship for selected customer Id
mobileNumberUpdate.verificationLinkSend: A verification link has been sent to the customer's new mobile number and will remain valid for 5 minutes. Please ask the customer to click on the link to verify their mobile number. They will have 3 attempts.
mobileNumberUpdate.attemptsExceeds: Mobile number verification maximum attempts exceeded! please try again after 24 hours
mobileNumberUpdate.numberWillUpdate: Your mobile number change request will be processed within 24 hrs
mobileNumberUpdate.tryWithFormBasedProcess: Please try again or continue with form based process.

errorMessages.aadhaarRequiredMessage: Aadhaar is required to proceed with mobile number update
errorMessages.aadharMustLinked: To update your mobile number, ensure your Aadhaar is linked to your bank account. Visit your nearest branch to link it if not done.

mobileEmailVerification.title: Mobile / Email Verification
mobileEmailVerification.lastVerifiedMoreThanThreeMonthsAgo: Mobile last verified more than 3 months ago, please re-verify.
mobileEmailVerification.mobileLinkSentToCustomer: Verification link is successfully sent to customer.

checkpoints.notEligibleForInstaTitle: Not Eligible for Insta Service Request
checkpoints.notEligibleForInstaMessage: Customer is not eligible for the Insta Service Request, please proceed with form based process.
checkpoints.mobileNumberMissingTitle: Email or Mobile number is missing!
checkpoints.aadhaarNotAvailable: Customer Aadhaar details are not available in bank records.
checkpoints.accountDormant: Account Status: Dormant. Please proceed with form based process.
checkpoints.accountInactiveOrBlocked: Customer account is inactive or blocked.
checkpoints.accountFreeze: Account Status: Debit freeze. Please proceed with form based process.
checkpoints.mobileNumberUpdateNeededMessage: Mobile number needs to be updated first, before proceeding with Re-KYC.
checkpoints.aadhaarReferenceNoMissingMessage: Please complete customer’s eKYC and continue with Insta services

username.userNameMinimumLength: Username must have a minimum of 3 characters

email.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user@example.com)

password.matchesRegex: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.

mobileNumber.valid: Please enter a valid mobile number

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: Your session has ended. Please log in again to continue.

refreshEvent.title: Are you sure, you want to leave?

pageNotFound.title: Page Not Found
pageNotFound.message: The requested URL was not found on this server.
